name: Astro Shop
description: A hyper-performant e-commerce demo site built with Astro, Tailwind, and React. Note: This site is no longer live.

name: Amazon Alexa
description: I contributed to several projects for Voice Focused, a company aiming to disrupt the voice assistant market. One project was unexpectedly demoed to Kentucky Fried Chicken by our sales team while I was finalizing it—literally as they were heading to the meeting. Although we didn’t win the business, it was a fun and memorable experience.
